definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落於重慶東部彈子石鎮附近一處黃砂岩懸崖上。

sentences.english: The edible-nest swiftlet has its home on a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 食用燕窩燕窩懸崖上有它的家。

sentences.english: He took pictures that were published in a book, "The Cliff Dwellers of the Mesa Verde."
sentences.chinese: 他拍了照片發表在《梅沙而第的懸崖窯洞》中。

sentences.english: We are standing at a precipice.
Sun, the Lehman Brothers economist, says as manufacturers are pushed to the brink, China's stock markets could see sharp declines.
sentences.chinese: 孫明春表示，製造商被推倒懸崖邊緣，中國股市大跌。

sentences.english: Suppose on the edge of a cliff is a beautiful flower, which I admire day and night.
sentences.chinese: 假如一個懸崖邊上有一朵我日思夜想的美麗鮮花。

sentences.english: The cliff fell away at his feet.
sentences.chinese: 在他的腳下，懸崖開始變得陡峭起來。

sentences.english: On the way up，you can see a cliff called Jiyu Bei.
sentences.chinese: 往上去，你們會看到一道被稱作“鯽魚背”的懸崖。

sentences.english: They snowboard over cliffs and mountain-bike down steep mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他們對滑雪的懸崖和山地自行車下陡峭的高山。

sentences.english: The path verges on a precipice.
The water plunges over a 182-foot cliff.
sentences.chinese: 水從182英尺高的懸崖直衝而下。

sentences.english: And he watches in horror as his car goes over a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 他驚駭地看着他的車衝進了懸崖。

sentences.english: We saw a hawk's aerie on the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到懸崖上有個鷹巢。

sentences.english: And dI'm standing on the edge of some crazy cliff.
sentences.chinese: 我會站在一道破懸崖邊上。

sentences.english: Faced with a precipice or a predator, the brain is biased to make certain decisions.
sentences.chinese: 面對懸崖或掠奪者，大腦做出的決定會有一定的不同。

sentences.english: The boy held on to the bush until someone climbed down the cliff to rescue him.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩抓住那棵矮樹，直到有人爬下懸崖去救他。

definition: Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
